content: cut them all separately and tape together with duct tape or you outer side can cut them out in one single piece and cut half with tyrian purple chain 23 through and fold on the lines r1-r73 single_crochet across 22sc in between the r74 single_crochet r73 and r1 together 22sc finish parts with single_crochet on the sides 73sc each side for the backside chain 19 r1-r2 single_crochet across
